p: The operation time for all patients was 94.1 Â± 37.9 min. All subjects collected postoperative pathological data, 42 cases (7.8%) were benign, and 495 cases (92.2%) were malignant. Among the malignant tumors, there were 489 cases of papillary carcinoma (91.1%), 4 cases of follicular carcinoma (0.007%), and two cases of medullary carcinoma (0.004%). One hundred and thirty-seven cases (25.5%) underwent simple gland resection, and 400 cases (74.5%) combined with lymphatic dissection ( Table 1).
